price: 32. Wana nde Allah, Nkolo wa bino ya soló. Nini sima ya bosembo eyaka sé libungi, kasi тропа nini bozali kotengama?
arabic: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fadhālikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-ḥaqu famādhā baʿda al-ḥaqi illā al-ḍalālu fa-annā tuṣ'rafūna
